fileNonExist.content: It will be removed from the list.
fileNonExist.title: File Not Found

playlistNonExist.content: File(s) has been removed or renamed.
playlistNonExist.title: File(s) Not Found

fileNonExistInPlaylist.content: Files has been removed from the list.
fileNonExistInPlaylist.title: File(s) Not Found

offLine.content: Please check network and try again.
offLine.title: No Network Access

update.message: Restart the app now to install update?
update.title: update dialog

welcome.welcomeDescription: All-new lightweight design, incredible performance with smart translation to let you enjoy your videos like never before.
welcome.agreement: By using SPlayer, you agree to our
welcome.languageDescription: * You can change your settings in preferences later

general.clearHistory: Always clear playback history on exit
general.reverseScrolling: Reverse mouse scrolling when adjusting volume
general.setDefault: Set as the Default Video Player
general.setDefaultDescription: Open all video files with SPlayer.
general.restoreSettingsDescription: Restart application with all data and caches erased.
general.switchDisplayLanguages: Display Language controls the language you see in SPlayer.

translate.languageDescription: Upload anonymous data to fetch translation results in the following language,  no privacy information will be included.
translate.setAsDefault: Set SPlayer as the Default Application

privacy.smartDescription: Offline identify sensitive or not-suitable-for-work contents, and clear the playback history when playing in a folder playlist or when quitting.
privacy.incognitoDescription: No playback history will be saved.

masVersion.content: Smart Translation function needs your consent for uploading anonymous media info to the server  side, and you will not receive translation results if you disagree. There is no privacy information will be collected.

tryToDisable.partOne: SPlayer uses anonymous data to enhance user experience. Smart Translation will be disabled if you

protectBubble.content: Smart Privacy Protection is enabled. Sensitive or not-suitable-for-work playback history will be removed.

needUpdate.content: SPlayer {version} is now available, would you like to download it now?

noNeed.content: SPlayer is up to date. Version {version}

loadVideoBySubtitleFailed.content: Cannot find any related video in the folder

select.title: Select Audio Language
select.content: To generate a translation result, please select the language you hear in the video and click the generate button. The process might take some time.

translate.title: About {time} Left
translate.content: Please do not skip the video or close the application. You can check the progress on the translation panel.
translate.contentTranslate: Subtitle in source language found, translation in process ...
translate.contentGrabbing: Subtitle in source language not found, extracting audio ...
translate.contentSpeech: Audio uploaded, speech recognition and translation in process ...

success.title: Translation Done
success.content: AI Translation is ready, please check it on the translation panel.

discard.title: AI Translation is in Progress
discard.content: Are you sure you want to quit? If you quit, the translation progress will not be restored.

noLineFail.title: Network Error
noLineFail.content: Please check your network connection and try again.

timeOutFail.title: Connection Timeout
timeOutFail.content: The connection to the server failed. Please try later.

serverErrorFail.title: Translation Failed
serverErrorFail.content: Translation failed because of a server error. Please try later.

translateBubble.bubbleWhenGrab: AI Translation will be aborted If you go on, do you want to continue anyway?
translateBubble.bubbleWhenTranslate: AI Translation is being processed on the server. You can check the progress when you watch the video next time.
translateBubble.bubbleFunctionForbidden: AI Translation will be aborted If you go on, do you want to continue anyway?

bubbleWhenSuccess.content:
AI Translation is ready now, 
please check it on the translation panel.

bubbleWhenSuccessOnOtherVideo.content:
AI Translation is ready now. 
It will be automatically loaded next time when you watch the video.

bubbleTranslateNoLineFail.title: Network Error
bubbleTranslateNoLineFail.content: Please check your network connection and try again.

bubbleTranslateTimeOutFail.title: Connection Timeout
bubbleTranslateTimeOutFail.content: The connection to the server failed. Please try later.

bubbleTranslateServerErrorFail.title: Translation Failed
bubbleTranslateServerErrorFail.content: Translation failed because of a server error. Please try later.
